dashboard.title: Cash Flow Analysis Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Comprehensive financial overview across all projects and decisions
dashboard.showingForecasted: Showing forecasted cash flow based on planned delivery and invoice timing from project configuration
dashboard.allAmountsConverted: All amounts converted to Iranian Rials (IRR) for unified comparison
dashboard.detailedViewDescription: Detailed view of revenue inflows and payment outflows (separate from budget allocations)
dashboard.dashboardDescription: This dashboard visualizes the projected cash flow based on finalized procurement decisions. It shows when payments are due (outflows), when revenue is expected (inflows), and the cumulative cash position over time.
dashboard.budgetAllocationDesc: Initial funds available for each period
dashboard.revenueInflowDesc: Expected payments from clients based on invoice dates
dashboard.paymentOutflowDesc: Payments to suppliers based on procurement terms
dashboard.cumulativeBalanceDesc: Running total showing cash position over time
dashboard.showingActualCashFlow: Showing actual cash flow based on real invoice data entered by the finance team.
dashboard.displayingOriginalCurrencies: Displaying amounts in original currencies (USD, EUR, IRR, etc.)

projectItems.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
projectItems.areYouSureFinalize: Are you sure you want to finalize this item? It will be visible in procurement.
projectItems.areYouSureUnfinalize: Are you sure you want to unfinalize this item? It will be removed from procurement view.
projectItems.areYouSureFinalizeAll: Are you sure you want to finalize all items in this project? This will make all items visible in procurement.
projectItems.cannotEditProcurement: Cannot edit: Procurement has finalized decision
projectItems.cannotDeleteProcurement: Cannot delete: Procurement has finalized decision
projectItems.cannotUnfinalizeProcurement: Cannot unfinalize: Procurement has finalized decision

procurement.itemsNotFinalized: • Items are not finalized (locked) by Finance
procurement.noProcurementOptionsYet: No procurement options yet. Click "Add Option" to create one.
procurement.onlyFinalizedOptions: Only finalized options will be used in procurement optimization

decisions.title: Finalized Decisions
decisions.subtitle: View and manage all procurement decisions across their lifecycle
decisions.cannotRevert: Cannot revert: Item is fully delivered, invoiced, and paid. This is a completed transaction.

finance.title: Finance Management
finance.invoiceAndPaymentSubtitle: Manage invoices and payments for all procurement decisions
finance.invoiceAndPaymentDescription: This section will allow you to enter actual invoice and payment data for finalized procurement decisions, creating accurate cash flow tracking.
finance.invoiceAndPaymentFeatureDescription: This feature will be available in the next update. It will provide comprehensive invoice and payment tracking for all procurement decisions.
finance.paymentsOutSubtitle: Manage payments made to suppliers for procurement items
finance.finalInvoiceDescription: Check this box if this is the final invoice for this item. The item will be removed from the invoice dropdown after creation.
finance.name: Name
finance.noExchangeRatesAvailable: No exchange rates available. Click "Add Exchange Rate" to create one.
finance.exchangeRatesNote: Exchange rates can be edited for each specific date. If you add a rate for a date that already exists, it will update the existing rate. The system uses the closest available rate on or before the transaction date for conversions.
finance.dateCannotBeChanged: Date cannot be changed when editing
finance.selectDateForExchangeRate: Select the date for this exchange rate
